## Estadisticos Descriptivos
```{r,echo=FALSE,results='markup'}
library(describeNsimulate)
descriptive(base)
```
## Matriz de Correlaciones
```{r,echo=FALSE,results='markup'}
corr_matrix(base)
```
## Histogramas
```{r,echo=FALSE,results='markup'}
   n<-ncol(base)
  c<-names(base)
  i<-1
  while(i<=n){
  graphics::hist(base[,i],col=colhist,main=c[i],xlab="")
      i<-i+1}
```
## Graficas Box Plot
```{r,echo=FALSE,results='markup'}
  n<-ncol(base)
  c<-names(base)
  j<-1
  while(j<=n){
 graphics::boxplot(base[,j],main=c[j],col=colbox)
    j<-j+1}
```
